Description: Fragment of a glazed composition tile, front decorated with representation of the legs of a bird, painted brown on a white ground with green longitudinal lines.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amarna, el-, TA:26/595 The North Suburb, South Central Quarter, House U.36.4. (?)
Curator's comments: Frankfort & Pendlebury, City of Akhenaten 2:15, pl. XXX, fig.4.
Exhibition history: 2012 7 December - 13 April 2013, Berlin, Neues Museum, In the Light of Amarna
